description: This is a Java source file implementing a REST controller for note management. It defines endpoints for creating, listing, retrieving, updating, and deleting notes, utilizing Spring Boot annotations and Swagger/OpenAPI annotations for API documentation.

classes.name: NoteController
classes.description: REST controller providing CRUD endpoints for notes, leveraging Spring Boot and Swagger annotations for API documentation.

methods.name: create
methods.description: Creates a new note and returns the created resource.

methods.name: list
methods.description: Returns a list of all notes.

methods.name: get
methods.description: Retrieves a single note by its ID. Throws NotFoundException if not found.

methods.name: update
methods.description: Updates an existing note identified by ID with new data.

methods.name: delete
methods.description: Deletes a note by its ID.
